patthana1.10:327.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.10:327.1_5: taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.10:327.1_9: vatthu dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.10:351.1_0: (Idha sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, missagataṁ atthi, pāḷiyaṁ kātabbaṁ. Gaṇanāya upadhāretvā gaṇetabbaṁ.)
